    • Constructor Detail

      • Suite

        public Suite(Street s0,
             Street s1,
             Street s2,
             java.lang.String cn,
             int cv)
        Explicit constructor that takes in 2-3 Street objects to include within the suite. To define a 2 Street suite, the third parameter must be null. Once the Street objects are set, they cannot be changed. The Street objects can be passed through in any order as they will be sorted in order of board position.
        Parameters:
        s0 - First Street object
        s1 - Second Street object
        s2 - Third Street object
        cn - String object of the Streets color
        cv - the int RGB value of the suite as gotten from Color.getRGB()

    • Method Detail

      • getStreets

        public java.util.List<Street> getStreets()

        public void setStreets(java.util.List<Street> s)

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNames()

      • refreshNames

        public void refreshNames()

      • isMonopolized

        public boolean isMonopolized(Player p)
        Determines if the passed in player owns all properties in the suite otherwise known as the playing monopolizing a suite
        Parameters:
        p - The player object of the assumed owner
        Returns:
        boolean: True if the player has monopolized the suite False if the player has not monopolized the suite

      • isBuildable

        public boolean isBuildable()
        Determines if the Street Properties held within the Suite can be upgraded/downgraded Determinants are: - All Properties are owned by the same player - All Properties are not mortgaged
        Returns:
        boolean: True if properties can be altered False if properties cannot be altered

      • sortedByPosition

        public java.util.List<Street> sortedByPosition()
        Returns a new ArrayList that contains all the Street objects in this suite sorted by position
        Returns:
        A new ArrayList of the Streets in the Suite

      • sortedByName

        public java.util.List<Street> sortedByName()
        Returns a new ArrayList that contains all the Street objects in this suite sorted by name
        Returns:
        A new ArrayList of the Streets in the Suite

      • highestGrade

        public int highestGrade()
        Finds the highest grade of all Streets in the Suite
        Returns:
        integer - a value between 0-5

      • lowestGrade

        public int lowestGrade()
        Finds the smallest grade of all the Streets in the Suite
        Returns:
        integer - a value between 0-5

      • gradeDisparity

        public int gradeDisparity()
        Compares the highest and lowest grades and returns their difference
        Returns:
        integer - a positive value that notes the greatest difference between the highest and lowest grade in the suite

      • totalGrade

        public int totalGrade()
        Summation of all the grades in the suite
        Returns:
        integer - sum of all grades
